verses.name: Numbers 14:4
verses.text: And they said one to another, Let us make a captain, and let us return into Egypt.

verses.name: Numbers 14:5
verses.text: Then Moses and Aaron fell on their faces before all the assembly of the congregation of the children of Israel.

verses.name: Numbers 14:6
verses.text: And Joshua the son of Nun, and Caleb the son of Jephunneh, which were of them that searched the land, rent their clothes:

verses.name: Numbers 14:7
verses.text: And they spake unto all the company of the children of Israel, saying, The land, which we passed through to search it, is an exceeding good land.
